description: Inspired by Colin Kaepernick, Nike created the Emmy-winning ‘Dream Crazy’ campaign and approached digital agency Matter Supply to launch it on the web within a month. The timeline accelerated further when Kaepernick tweeted the campaign a few days early. In this talk, Marc Amman, CEO of Matter Supply, describes how his team was able to deliver the campaign on time—even ahead of schedule—thanks to the JAMstack and Netlify. https://mattersupply.co/
title: Matter Supply fast tracks iconic Nike campaign with the JAMstack
